title: Set up routing with anchor navigation for all sections
progressNotes: ### Implementation Details  Created a complete anchor navigation routing system for the personal landing page:  **Files Created:** - `index.html` - Single-page landing page with 6 sections and anchor navigation - `styles.css` - Comprehensive styling with responsive design, accessibility, and print styles - `script.js` - JavaScript module for smooth scrolling, active state management, and URL hash synchronization - `tests/navigation.test.js` - Test suite verifying navigation functionality  **Sections Implemented:** 1. **Hero** (`#hero`) - Name, title, value proposition, CTA, credibility badges 2. **Services** (`#services`) - Service cards with outcomes and audience labels 3. **Highlights** (`#highlights`) - Business impact case signals 4. **Thought Leadership** (`#thought-leadership`) - Micro-insights linking to external profiles 5. **Bio** (`#bio`) - Avatar placeholder, bio text, social links 6. **Contact** (`#contact`) - Calendly booking, email link, validated contact form  **Key Features:** - Fixed anchor navigation bar with active state highlighting - Smooth scrolling with 80px offset for fixed header - URL hash synchronization (supports browser back/forward) - Client-side form validation with error messages - Responsive design for mobile and desktop - Accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, reduced motion support) - Print-optimized styles  **Technical Details:** - Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS (no external dependencies) - CSS custom properties for consistent theming - Scroll-based active link highlighting - Browser history API integration  **Tests:** 35 tests passed covering navigation links, section IDs, URL hash handling, form validation, and integration flows.  ## Patterns Discovered  - Always check for existing patterns in AGENTS.md before implementing new features - Prefer established libraries and frameworks already used in the project - Follow the existing code style and naming conventions -
